Niels tells Delfine she's being considered for a TV talk show. Reporter Bauwens has bought pictures of David encountering prostitutes. Police detective De Smet tells him about LSD traces in David's blood.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: After the article on David meeting prostitutes, nearly everybody turns against him. Herman wants him out of the house, the charity wants his works withdrawn from the exhibition, the book is canceled, Wellens Pharma decides to dump the bio-products, Stijn refuses him as anti-globalist volunteer. Tim and Sofie stand by him unconditionally. Maarten refuses to advice Herman about the Klaerghout stock problems but is allowed to work part-time.

170.title: Episode #1.170
170.plot: Tim, still grieving for Robbie and objects to his chemistry professor's announcing the two chapters he won't cover in lectures will be exam material (and refuses to answer those questions although worth 8 out of 20 points). Lotte and Sofie arrange for Jan to be hired by Herman as a gardener in Maarten's temporary absence. Sofie has undone some of the damage of David's encounter with prostitutes while Pieter and Ludo hope it will discredit David if he ever remembers the illegal drug tests.

171.title: Episode #1.171
171.plot: Tim is cramming again with Quinten and Laura. Maarten enjoys growing in fatherhood but still fails to find a way to combine it with a return to exploiting his financial expertise. Sander suddenly faints. Niels's documentary airing satisfies Delfine's vanity and stirs philosophizing about image. But it contains embarrassing indiscretions. Pieter's attempt to inject David with another memory-blocking cocktail goes wrong.

172.title: Episode #1.172
172.plot: While Tim is cramming, Stijn gets Tessa to steal a drug from the college lab to stage drug-dealing 'by Tim'. After Pieter got injected himself instead of David, he forgets a house-hunt appointment, so Sofie pouts having missed out on her first choice. Maarten arranges to help Herman with his stock problem after all. Niels tells Delfine his job comes first, she third. David works in Jan as household helper.

173.title: Episode #1.173
173.plot: Tim studies for his life now he must get 12/12 on the exam questions he won't boycott. Stijn pays equally unsuspecting students to hand Tim the pills Tessa stole and cash so he can record him 'dealing', then posts it all on YouTube. Haughty Laura and even Quinten actually believe it and dump Tim. Pieter gets Sofie's dream-house from the initial buyers. Sander is diagnosed with leukemia but sticks to his fanatical aversion of scientific medicine.

174.title: Episode #1.174
174.plot: Despite Tim's bleak predicament, he over the moon when Robbie returns to help him. The boys make love passionately. David confidently meets media people Niels and Karel to redeem his public image. Pieter tells his parents he can make Sofie convince Herman to buy back the bio-products. Maarten examines Klaerhout's stock slump.

175.title: Episode #1.175
175.plot: Tim and Robbie passionately celebrate being united as true lovers all the way, after Tim makes clear he's trough with lesser flirts. Then it's time to concentrate on proving Tim's 'pill dealing' was staged expertly by Stijn. Herman buys back the bio-line at half price. Pieter is openly furious about Sofie still caring for 'unvivilised' David, who seeks comfort with fellow painter Tom.

176.title: Episode #1.176
176.plot: Robbie can barely convince Tim to interrupt their passion to attend classes. As if being taunted by all students, even 'mate' Quinten, weren't bad enough, Tim's chemistry professor sneers he's liable to be expelled. Maarten informs Herman he sees trough Bea's dirty stock manipulation. Now the press restores David's pure reputation, she assumes Herman 'cheated' her (back) and vow revenge. Pieter rudely presses David must move to Antwerp, where present guest Tom lives, very soon.

177.title: Episode #1.177
177.plot: Robbie delights Tim by cooking a pasta dinner and announcing he he found the way to download the original recordings Stijn manipulated. Sander still won't listen to therapeutic reason. Maarten broods on saving Klaerhout's stock. Even Sofie admits David's stalking must cease, but he won't get marriage is exclusive. Pieter presses to make him move in with Antwerp friend Tom.

178.title: Episode #1.178
178.plot: Tim and Robbie's happiness is cut short when they discover the original videos are deleted from Stijn's notebook before Robbie could download them. While students massively believe Stijn's fake video, Robbie and Tim kiss publicly in front of them all. Pieter's fury about David stalking Sofie, now literally, isn't effectively supported by Herman or Sofie. Herman coldly rebukes Bea virtual take-over arrogance. Maarten convinces a friend trader to help Klarerhout by talking into the present stock guru's vanity.

179.title: Episode #1.179
179.plot: Robbie is warmly welcomed back by Herman as Tim's steady lover, and for offering help to identify the hacker. Tim firmly refuses Laura's 'maybe I was prematurely judgmental' semi-excuses. Sander stubbornly braves tough love from Andrea and Lotte who can't stand by how he dies just to preserve his medically fatal 'principles'. Ludo tells already furious Pieter he saw Sofie sneak off to the beach with 'stalker' David. Pieter bitterly confronts her passive lies, demanding she finally sets borders for her and David.

180.title: Episode #1.180
180.plot: Told about the 'dealer video', Herman asks Tim to explain the truth and follows Robbie's suggestion to contact the Internet police brigade. Hannelore tells Herman she spilled Maarten's method to Wellens' stock trader Renaat Davenburg. Sander finally gets promised unconditional maternal support regardless of his stubborn therapeutic stupidity. Sofie finally tells David to respect the exclusive borders of marriage, but he takes Maarten's explanation that means 'only what we do' too literally.

181.title: Episode #1.181
181.plot: Only Tim accepts to help Delfine prepare for her new TV show. Ludo's ex-secretary hates Bea, so she spills the Wellens charade to Andrea. After Hannelore's confession, Herman and David press Maarten to save the Klaerhout stock. Lotte enlists Frankie, Sander's homeopathic therapist, to help convince him to accept real medical treatment. Frankie contacts Sofie about bio-medication, she decides to take the short holiday Pieter suggested to the Amazone forest, the most promising source of natural cures.

182.title: Episode #1.182
182.plot: After the talk show prepping, Tim misses Robbie badly, but follows his advice by receiving police detective Kevin and briefs him on Stijn's vicious video, so the fiend's PC is confiscated. After a scolding match between Herman and Bea about 'dirty tricks', she fires Andrea and Hannelore and orders trader Renaat to kill off the Klaerhout stock. Because nun Rita remembered Pieter, he must admit to angry Sofie he took David's blood samples for research. Frankie and reinforcements convince Sander to try classical therapy.

183.title: Episode #1.183
183.plot: Stijn promises to return the original recordings if Tim drops his complaint, but it's a ruse to intrude and start a beastly fight. Sander is back at Lotte's, where Steven arrives demanding David's contract be honored, or bought off- by selling him the gallery. Maarten tells Liesbeth he has to trade again to save Klaerhout. David's Soefie-obsession now even extends to jealousy against Pieter, which even Herman urges she must rebuke.

184.title: Episode #1.184
184.plot: Tim gets a visit from police detective Kevin and accepts to file a formal complaint against Stijn, so the fiends's PC can be confiscated to track down the originals of the doctored video recording. Caspar is amused by Delfine's TV career enthusiasm, and in his dry style gives her the right push to go on.

185.title: Episode #1.185
185.plot: Tim accepts to lure Sofie to his penthouse so David can urge her to admit being i love with him and pleading to marry him, not Pieter. In class, Robbie shows the original recordings so everyone sees Stijn lied. When the fiend just scolds the 'sissy queers', they lovers proudly kiss. Not only the students cheer them and boo Stijn, even Tim's hostile chemistry professor apologizes for failing to counter bullying and tells Tim Stijn's father is pulling him from class. Maarten promises Herman to try countering trader Davenburg. Lotte makes reluctant Sander face the grim ...

186.title: Episode #1.186
186.plot: Tim and Robbie celebrate their victory over Stijn, although Tim sort of pities the fiend being ordered to stop studying by his dad. Herman calls an extended family council to formally announce his engagement to Andrea and her return to Klaerhout. Maarten's plan is working, although it doesn't seem to help the Klaerhout stock yet, so Renaat still believes he can kill off the firm. Robbie sweetly considers to return as sign of trust. Sofie acts coldly to both pushy David and groom Pieter.

187.title: Episode #1.187
187.plot: To Tim's delight, Robbie asks and gets his Klaerhout job back, so he can return from Luxemburg for good. Sofie tells Pieter she needs time alone to consider her feeling for him and David. Startled Herman suggests she does so in Andrea's apartment now she moves in the Klaerhout home. Pieter self-inflicts a shin-wound he blames David for. Sander convinces Lotte the gallery deal is worthwhile if David resumes his career. Robbie refuses to react to a letter from his parents.

188.title: Episode #1.188
188.plot: Tim asks his dad for help to find Robbie's estranged parents, but there are no data in his personnel file. Casper talks Delfine out of giving up her talk-show just because of bitching friends. Sander suggests to Stijn taking over his cab shift now dad won't pay his studies anymore. Maarten starts the decisive Klaerhout stock battle against Renaat Davenburg, which seems to work.

189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: Tim's request to help find Robbie's parents is rudely ignored by their ex Sven. David's Sofie-obsession leads to Tim considering his theory the robot-picture of the hacker's boss is Pieter. Stijn is back in the students bar, teaming up with his paroled anti-globalist friend. Sander accepts delaying moving into ma Andrea's apartment now she moves in with Herman, despite Delfine, who really stresses about her TV career. Lotte wants to make up with her dad by making Jan their firm's their administrator. Pieter blames his parents for being estranged from Sofie.

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: Tim sneaks into Herman's office to peek into Robbie's file, searching for his lover's parents, without telling him. He's caught by the night-watchman, but believed he's on an errant for dad. Janos accepts to become Delfine's next TV talk-show guest. When Sofie tells Pieter she doubts their love, Pieter first tries to convince her moving out can cure her David obsession, ultimately dumps her too in rage.

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Tim breaks in to dad's office to peek at Robbie's secret personnel file. After reading his lover has a criminal record for 'vice offenses', they have a bitchy row and break up. Sander agrees to offer Jan joint directorship of their art trade firm. Herman shows Sofie the robot picture. Pieter and his parents panic.

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: Tim rages his dad should have warned him for Robbie's vice-past, only to be told his own breaking actually is criminal, while Robbie was merely charged with illicit urinating. Tim still disregards Robbie's wish to stay out of his family troubles. Pieter is too late to destroy the evidence of his illegal research methods. Sofie finds everything and has him banned from the firm premises. Pieter blackmails his parents to save is bacon. Liesbeth finds Maarten collaborating with Hannelore and scolds it traitorous 'infidelity'. Jan happily accepts the co-directorship.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: Although Robbie is still bitter about his latest stunt, Tim pleads and begs till Sven sort of forgives him and passes Robbie's parents' coordinates. After Robbie finds Pieter's PC files, Sofie tells Herman his illegal tests on David compromise the entire Alzheimer cure break-trough. Herman and Andrea want to report it to the ethics commission, even after Bea offers to share the risk by speeding up the merger, which Herman now refuses. After failing to find a 'regular' job, David gets one in Klaerhout's cleaning crew. Maarten considers jealous Liesbeth a lost cause and...

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Tim meets Robbie's parents over an oysters dinner, rather too fancy for them. They tell him that Robbie was the one who cut all ties, as if they weren't good enough any more. Tim finds they didn't know Robbie is gay, and may have given him the impression to be homophobes. David is fired from the cleaning crew for peeking at papers showing Pieter used him as guinea-pig. Believing Sofie knew, he desperately runs away, stranding with a homeless loner on the beach. Herman swears he'll fight for firm and family. The Wellens family is desperate enough to decide Pieter must ...

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: Pieter has escaped with the research results and evidence, but is arrested at the Wellens home. Tim decides to visit home, but first tenderly hugs Robbie who, decides to meet his parents. Jan gets Lotte's confidence to counter Steven's take-over. After Delfine asks both musicians for her next talk-show, Casper warns she's only using them, but Janos declares to love her. Maarten is back home, David still clueless now even Sofie seems a selfish liar.

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Police detective De Smet compares Pieter's, David's and Sofie's stories, which adds up to lending least credence to hers, so she's charged as accomplice. Stijn finds a cahoot for 'revenge' on Tim. On Jan's advice, Lotte asks Steven for a cash advance. David is completely disheartened.

197.title: Episode #1.197
197.plot: Hugo manages to keep Sofie free pending the police investigation, unlike Pieter. Ludo finds himself an official suspect too, so he calls his own lawyer. Sander is too sick to help Lotte move from the sold gallery to Andrea's apartment. Hannelore convinces Lisa she wants Hugo, not Maarten. David rages at Sofie that her whole civilization lies, even her, which hurts him must.

198.title: Episode #1.198
198.plot: While Tim prepares dinner for Robbie's parents, he tries to calm Quinten and Laura, who fear she is pregnant, and he convinces her to do a test. Steven warns Janos that Delfine will dump him as soon a she finds a better catch, such as himself on account of his 'good stock'. Having lost his partner too, Maarten commiserates with Sofie and moves into David's workshop-home, Sander and Lotte in Andrea's apartment. Steven shows the gallery to another of his artists. Tom takes in David. Herman broods on a way out for Klaerhout Pharma.

199.title: Episode #1.199
199.plot: Tim grudgingly abandons the dinner with Robbie and his parents to attend a Klaerhout family council, where Herman's plan, mortgaging the home estate to finance Andrea's research project, is accepted. Casper gets a kiss from Delfine as soon as he suggests to present her to his showbiz-influential parents. Maarten tells Liesbeth he can't return to his menial job, but will only return to her if they commit for good. De Smet grills Pieter. Quinten makes Laura admit she is pregnant, and either he or Tim might be the father.

200.title: Episode #1.200
200.plot: Tim and Robbie are happy now his parents ask them for a return dinner, until Quinten arrives to tell them Laura is pregnant. When the medical ethics representative arrives at Klaerhout HQ, Sofie asks Herman to offer the Alzheimer results to an third firm. The police arrives also and finds an Alzheimer file in Hannelore's former office, according to her planted by Pieter. That accidentally sabotages Stijn and Fien's plan to free lab animals. Stijn blames Sander, who records that scolding as evidence to be used if they pull another stunt.

201.title: Episode #1.201
201.plot: Tim, Robbie, Quinten and Laura worry about the effects of her pregnancy, but the doctor concludes false alert. Pieter and Ludo are formally charged, based on their own accusations. Maarten advices Herman to announce the merger is canceled, just in time: the Klaerhout stock actually rises. The medical ethics commission clears Klaerhout, the Alzheimer project may also be salvageable. Hugo keep Sofie out of jail, unlike Pieter. Casper's parents are charmed by Delfine.

202.title: Episode #1.202
202.plot: Casper admits to Janos that Delfine intrigues him. Tim and Robbie visit Sofie for support, like Maarten, who was just hired as Klaerhout's new accountant. There they get the news Herman has formally proposed to Andrea, with diamond ring, and plans a wedding. Tom's idea David can help people by teaching graffiti vandals artistic painting fails. Steven is a wreck after the gallery fire. The news the merger is off shatters Bea.

203.title: Episode #1.203
203.plot: Even Casper now hopes Delfine might really care for Janos. The medical ethics commission completely clears Klaerhout. Now Andrea accepts to resume the Alzheimer research. Sander's plan to start a gallery with Lotte from the fire insurance payments saddens them. Maarten's new job allows a reconciliation with Liesbeth. Unlike Quinten, Tim still mistrusts Tessa. In jail, Bea tells bitterly startled Pieter and Ludo they have no more future in the Wellens firm, even if either gets out. David's dad Christian packs, nostalgically, to sail back to Miami.

204.title: Episode #1.204
204.plot: Robbie helps Sofie trace David's dad after all, in Antwerp, about to sail to sail to Miami for good. She reunites them, which arouses instant memories, enough for them to plan a joint emigration, but first David declares his love to Sofie and asks for her hand. At the wedding, Robbie remarks her emigration, ultimately to Amazonia, leaves Tim the new Klaerhout heir. Sander mediates between Lotte and Jan about starting a New York gallery or staying together. Delfine chooses Janos over Casper. Wellens pharmacy is closed down.

-1.title: Episode dated 6 November 2009
-1.plot: Now the bunch treats Tim as teacher's pet too, he gets into a bar fistfight with Quentin. Pieter enjoyed the enforced sex with Hannelore, not her blackmail. Maarten can't talk David out of joining the anti-globalist action and refuses to help Sander by making him look 'naturally' rough. On a beach walk, David saves a drowning boy. On Janos's tour, Delfine clashes instance when meeting his musician Kasper. Lotte and her gallery's recommended guest artist Mathias Goethals don't get along either.

imdb.plot outline: Herman Klaerhout is the CEO of a Belgian pharmaceutical company. His son Tim starts studying chemistry, which earns him new friends and enemies. Robby, the firm's young ICT specialist, acts as Tim's motivating father-substitute or gentle big brother and has a gay crush on him. Tim's sister Sofie, the firm's research star, returns from a Caribean holiday with her fiancé Pieter Wellens, also researcher an pharmaceutics heir, with an island-stranded young man who only gradually starts remembering his past as Belgian David Verbeecke. The rustic Klaerhout estate in managed by Maarten, a frustrated former finance whiz. Herman's deputy Andrea's idealistic son Sander gets in trouble with activists and his lover, spoiled gallery owner Lotte.
